name: DO U EVEN CUBE?
description:
What's up guys, decided to learn unity while in the hospital, followed a tutorial by Brackys, then changed a lot using my previous experience in programming, will probably continue development for a few weeks, might change the graphics and such, I'm not that good at coming up with game ideas so if you've got any be sure to send those my way. Have fun, the 8th level is kinda tough but doable. The cube likes to fly, which is not a bug but a feature, adds some surprise mechanics. I won't ask for donations, but if you do donate then that'd be greatly appreciated.

The Web version does not work perfectly, you might have to fullscreen it to get the resolution working, and the physics are a little weird.

WEB VERSION: https://itch.io/embed-upload/2583277?color=6f6f6f
